group_1.narration: And so,@Nagisa followed the strange@creature to go hunt a Witch@together with a Magical Girl.@What adventures await them@inside the Witch's Labyrinth?

group_1.textLeft: So, when is this Magical Girl supposed to@arrive?
Shouldn't she be here by now?

group_1.textRight: She was nearby the last time I checked...
I didn't tell her I was bringing you, Nagisa.
Maybe she's being cautious because of that.
Yesterday, we agreed to meet today.
I was going to give her information in@exchange for meeting with us.

group_1.textLeft: If you plan to meet up with a friend, you@shouldn't bring someone else along.
You need to learn some common sense,@Kyubey.

group_1.textRight: Your culture is so hard to understand...
I'll go and talk to her, on my own.

group_1.textLeft: This was a waste of time.
